Introduction

LA POEM (also written as La Poem) is a four-member crossover boy group under Studio JAMM. They were the winner of Phantom Singer 3.They debuted on July 3, 2020 as a contestant of Phantom Singer 3 and released their first mini album Scene#1 on December 2, 2020. On February 18, 2022, it was revealed that the members' contracts with Moss Music has been terminated. On March 10, 2022, Studio JAMM, a studio specializing in K-pop entertainment founded by JTBC, announced that they had signed an exclusive contract with LA POEM as their first artist.
